local_intent: Execute side pinch grasp on green_bottle and verify it is held.
assumptions: ComputeGraspPose writes pose to key 'goal_pose' consumed by GraspAtPose
Perception can localize 'green_bottle' within retry budget
coherence_with_global: Matches global: detect, open, align, compute side grasp to goal_pose, grasp with pinch, close gripper, then verify ObjectInGripper.
